_header: Both young and old take heed of this
_description: James Ryman, a song — six quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Ecce quod natura /mutat sua iura / virgo parit pura / dei filium’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Bothe yonge and olde take hede of thisThe cours of nature chaunged
                    is…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…This king so free of magesteeThat in Bedleme was
                    borne
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 186-7.

            1977: 40; 1977, 33-4.
